product_name: Carve Designs Vista Tankini Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Carve Vista Tankini Top features soft, stretchy, water-ready fabric that offers full coverage without binding or restricting movement. You'll be ready to go the moment you put it on. Vista tankini top offers support for low-impact activities; removable soft cups accommodate A, B, C and D cup sizes. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Closeout.
short_description: The Carve Vista Tankini Top features soft, stretchy, water-ready fabric that offers full coverage without binding or restricting movement. You'll be ready to go the moment you put it on.
